title: OP Champs
body: Darius Morde Ekko. Jesus christ m9. No weaknesses

replies.body: Why Ekko? I actually think he's pretty balanced ATM.
Sort of is sort of isn't. Tonnes of strengths in jungle and in lane. Normal junglers can barely keep up. Ekko is basically a stronger version of Vi
that's cos you all go ad tank vi go pure damage ult the adc e then q the mid lanner e and there we go you just took out the adc and mid lanner in 5 seconds
In silver+ you can't always do random stuff dude. You gotta be most effective in your role for you and the team. Ad vi jungler may not be much of a good choice
A lot of people play ap hyper carry ekko, but tank jungler ekko is absolutely broken.
yep look at riven dats a op champ
